'''Gyntel''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A jovial man at the bar grins and motions you closer. His arms are corded with thick muscle and crosshatched with scars.}}
Gyntel is the owner and proprietor of the Wild Mare, the finest drinking establishment this side of Neketaka.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Food, supplies, rooms, crew
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * [Tekēhu](/tekehu/) has an unique interaction with Gyntel (on account of being banned from the establishment after drinking too much, stealing Gyntel's wine, drunkenly serenading on the stage, and trying to kiss the bartender when he was kicking him out)
}}

## =Rooms

=
Gyntel offers the following rooms: 
* Backstage storage room (free)
* Private Dance Room ({{cp2|200}}): +1 casts with level 1 spells, +1 all skills (1 rest)
* Konstanten's Room ({{cp2|800}} - only available if you hired [Konstanten](/konstanten/)): +3 [Dexterity](/dexterity/), 30% chance to reflect against spells.
[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)

'''Gyntel''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|A jovial man at the bar grins and motions you closer. His arms are corded with thick muscle and crosshatched with scars.}}
Gyntel is the owner and proprietor of the Wild Mare, the finest drinking establishment this side of Neketaka.

==Interactions==
{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Food, supplies, rooms, crew
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * [[Tekēhu]] has an unique interaction with Gyntel (on account of being banned from the establishment after drinking too much, stealing Gyntel's wine, drunkenly serenading on the stage, and trying to kiss the bartender when he was kicking him out)
}}

===Rooms===
Gyntel offers the following rooms: 
* Backstage storage room (free)
* Private Dance Room ({{cp2|200}}): +1 casts with level 1 spells, +1 all skills (1 rest)
* Konstanten's Room ({{cp2|800}} - only available if you hired [[Konstanten]]): +3 [[Dexterity]], 30% chance to reflect against spells.
